description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'CorrectionPurchaseInvoiceReversal'. It is used to reverse the correction purchase invoice.

operations.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'CorrectionPurchaseInvoiceReversal' with the given id.
Retrieve a collection of 'CorrectionPurchaseInvoiceReversal' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.
Create an instance of 'CorrectionPurchaseInvoiceReversal' with the given payload of type 'Document' in JSON format.
operations.example:
POST https://localhost:50000/b1s/v2/CorrectionPurchaseInvoiceReversal
{
    "CardCode": "v001",
    "Comments": "add correction invoice reversal based on correction invoice",
    "DocDate": "2014-12-06",
    "DocDueDate": "2014-12-06",
    "InternalCorrectedDocNum": "8"
}

operations.description: Update an instance of 'CorrectionPurchaseInvoiceReversal' with the given payload of type 'Document' in JSON format and with the specified id.
Invoke the method 'Close' on this EntitySet with the specified id.
Invoke the method 'Cancel' on this EntitySet with the specified id.
Invoke the method 'Reopen' on this EntitySet with the specified id.
Invoke the method 'CreateCancellationDocument' on this EntitySet with the specified id.
